item.title: #TIL 2018-03-25 : til, sysadmin, string, file
item.description: SYSADMIN Create a sequence of numbers In the past, every time I want to create a sequence of numbers. I have to use something like MS EXCEL, then copy it and paste to text editor. It’s tricky way and slow ! Now, I can use the handy tool seq to achieve that man seq SEQ(1) User Commands SEQ(1) NAME seq - print a sequence of numbers SYNOPSIS seq [OPTION]... LAST seq [OPTION].
